The "problem" is your planet. 

Scatterer atmospheres render in a perfect sphere, so any parts of the body that have a greater altitude than that of the Scatterer sphere will not be scattered, and will cause the issue you are seeing. You will need to adjust your planets Scatterer settings and raise it until the issue is gone.
